actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to improve motor fuel supply and distribution.
short_title: Motor Fuel Supply and Distribution Improvement Act

summary.text: Motor Fuel Supply and Distribution Improvement Act - Amends the Clean Air Act to: (1) update provisions limiting the number of gasoline or diesel fuels allowed in a state implementation plan; and (2) allow a limited, temporary waiver of a control or prohibition of a fuel or fuel additive in circumstances that prevent the distribution of an adequate supply of such fuel or fuel additive to consumers.

titles.title: Motor Fuel Supply and Distribution Improvement Act
A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to improve motor fuel supply and distribution.
